title: 7.2.6 Create ScanOrchestrator service
body:
## Parent Issue
#30 - 7.2 Security Scanner Engine

## Objective
Implement scan orchestration with parallel scanning and progress tracking.

## Features
- start_scan(tenant_id, aws_account_id) - Start background scan
- get_scan_status(job_id) - Get progress
- cancel_scan(job_id) - Cancel running scan
- Parallel scanner execution
- Trial limit enforcement

## Files to Create
- `src/cloud_optimizer/services/scan_orchestrator.py`

## Estimated Time: 3 hours
